price: لەو (بەھەشتە)دا پەرداخی شەراب لە یەکتری وەردەگرن نە قسەی پڕو پووچی تێدایە ونەگوناە کردن
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
